```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE
)

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
laugenknoten_data <- read_csv("Laugendata.csv")
laugenknoten_data <- laugenknoten_data %>% 
  mutate(
    ID = row_number(),
    Weekday = lubridate::wday(laugenknoten_data$Date, label=T),
    Time = as.character(Time),
    Timeframe = case_when(
      Time <= "12:00"  ~ "< 12:00",
      Time > "12:00" && Time <= "14:30"  ~ "12:00 - 14:30",
      Time > "14:30"  ~ "> 14:30",
    )
  ) %>% 
  select(ID,Date,Weekday,Time,Timeframe,Amount,Mensa)

laugenknoten_data
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
laugenknoten_data <- laugenknoten_data %>% 
  group_by(
    Mensa,
    Weekday,
    Timeframe
  ) %>% 
  summarise(
    average = mean(Amount)
  ) %>% 
  arrange(desc(Mensa))

laugenknoten_data
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
laugenknoten_data %>% 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = Weekday,
      y = average
    )
  ) +
  geom_col() + 
  labs(
    title = "Laugenknoten nach Wochentagen",
    x = "Wochentag",
    y = "Durchschnitt"
  ) + 
  facet_grid(Mensa ~ Timeframe)
```
